body_html:
That's a fair point, because name_scope is about op names only, it's tied much stronger to strings.

I don't think we'll change that, it is much more likely that variable_scope will disappear from view much more than it is that we'll increase the scope of name_scope.
body_text:
That's a fair point, because name_scope is about op names only, it's tied much stronger to strings.
I don't think we'll change that, it is much more likely that variable_scope will disappear from view much more than it is that we'll increase the scope of name_scope.
body:
That's a fair point, because name_scope is about op names only, it's tied much stronger to strings. 

I don't think we'll change that, it is much more likely that variable_scope will disappear from view much more than it is that we'll increase the scope of name_scope.
